item.title: Add Mocha reporter for Karma unit tests to your Angular CLI project
item.description: Every Angular CLI generated project comes already with a test setup in place using Karma. I think the default "progress" test result report is not as nice however.

item.title: Create a CD pipeline with Angular, GitLab and Firebase
item.description: I’m a huge fan of automating all the stuff. Even if you’re a very precise and organized person, you’re likely to make mistakes. Be it because you do multiple things at the same time, you get distracted wherever.
